main event: Youths in Braintree, Massachusetts observed a flying saucer and its occupants, noting its fantastic speed.
interesting points: The craft traveled faster than any jet in the sky., The group expressed belief that the object may have been a meteor if not for its speed., The organization NICAP accused the Air Force of withholding information about UFOs., A formal report to the Air Force using AF Form 164 was suggested for further submissions., The investigation was graded as 'INSUFFICIENT DATA' due to a lack of received reports.
